basics.name: Joel Macey
basics.label: Software And
basics.summary: I am a full stack developer who enjoys working in an agile environment with a collaborative team. I am passionate about creating modular, scalable, smart looking web apps. I enjoy balancing the need for test driven and benchmark driven development, modern creative design, and task completion efficiency and quality. I specialize in. And node. J's full stack development.

references.reference: I have worked with Joel at practicing law on police. I happy only client and recommend him. Highly recommended!
references.name: Alex Ling

references.reference: I worked with Joel for several years and during that time always found Joel to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. He is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. When asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Joel delivered without hesitation and with excellent execution, even if the projects were outside of his immediate role. I would highly recommend Joel for his positive character as a member of any creative team.
